name: Bomb Rush (Chalo Rivas)
description:
Can you survive the night? 

Complete the 5 waves of overwhelming enemies to see the light of day again... 

And remember...  do not rest! Is better if you keep moving....

Controls

Movement: W-A-S-D

Bomb placement: Spacebar
